column1: Data for the initialisation of the stock market simulation
The closing price shown is the price that the company
will start trading at at opening of business 1 January 2017
Figures in the main section show the number of shares
W&G's appointed trader will be responsible for managing the wealth of Norbert DaVinci and Justine Thyme.
The random traders will be responsible for managing the wealth of all other clients.
Each random trader must have at least one client, but other than that, the assignment is up to you.
At this time, we do not know what the client preference for risk is.
